Quality Education.reason: Focus on qualitative research methods in education → relevant to Quality Education.

有能力獨立計劃並嘗試去執行一個質性研究

Quality Education.reason: The course is fundamentally about improving educational research. Its title is 'Qualitative Methods in Education' and fieldwork is conducted in an 'educational setting'.

開課單位：教育碩一、教育博一、教育碩二、教育博二
